_commentHeader: This is sample json for the Most Popular section of the application
items - each of the objects in this is a different row in the most popular section
title - This is the title of the most popular row
thumbnails - This is an array, containing each of the thumbnails that should be displayed in this row
id - The unique id assigned to this movie, from which we can reference the full movie information
poster - The link to the thumbnail art that we are to display in the row
exclusive - a boolean, true if this movie has exclusive content available, and false if it does not
hd - a boolean, true if this movie has HD content available, and false if it does not
divider: --------------------------------------------------------- making this document easier to read for people

thumbnails.title: Tyler Perry's Boo 2! A Madea Halloween
Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets
War for the Planet of the Apes
